subject: CFP:: ICIEIS 2013:: Kuala Lumpur- Malaysia
from: "The Second International Conference on Informatics Engineering & Information Science (ICIEIS2013)" <donotreply@dcmrf.net>
body:
The Second International Conference on Informatics Engineering & Information Science (ICIEIS2013) Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia Nov. 12-14, 2013 http://sdiwc.net ========================================================================== The proposed conference on the above theme will be held at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia from Nov. 12-14, 2013 which aims to enable researchers build connections between different digital applications. The conference welcome papers on the following (but not limited to) research topics, However, papers on applications of Intelligent Methods in information Science and Informatics Engineering tracks are especially welcome: ****Intelligent Methods and Applications ****Information Science ****Informatics Engineering Researchers are encouraged to submit their work electronically. All papers will be fully refereed by a minimum of two specialized referees. Before final acceptance, all referees comments must be considered. Important Dates ============== Submission Deadline : Oct. 12, 2013 Notification of Acceptance: Oct. 30, 2013 Camera Ready Submission : Nov. 02, 2013 Last Day for Registration : Nov. 02, 2013, however Conference Dates : Nov. 12-14, 2013 ---------------------------------------- If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://dcmrf.net/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=65b73db1921a24fbe97786870799ab0b The Second International Conference on Informatics Engineering & Information Science (ICIEIS2013)
Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Nov. 12-14, 2013
http://sdiwc.net
==========================================================================
The proposed conference on the above theme will be held at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia from Nov. 12-14, 2013 which aims to enable researchers build connections between different digital applications.


The conference welcome papers on the following (but not limited to) research topics, However, papers on applications of Intelligent Methods in information Science and Informatics Engineering tracks are especially welcome:


****Intelligent Methods and Applications

****Information Science

****Informatics Engineering


Researchers are encouraged to submit their work electronically. All papers will be fully refereed by a minimum of two specialized referees. Before final acceptance, all referees comments must be considered.

Important Dates
==============
Submission Deadline : Oct. 12, 2013
Notification of Acceptance: Oct. 30, 2013
Camera Ready Submission : Nov. 02, 2013
Last Day for Registration : Nov. 02, 2013, however
Conference Dates : Nov. 12-14, 2013

If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://dcmrf.net/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=65b73db1921a24fbe97786870799ab0b
